title: Playoff Implications With Danny Kelly | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 371)
description:
The Ringer’s Kevin Clark is joined by Danny Kelly to forecast the playoff picture after an exciting Week 16, discuss home field advantage, and look back on the 2017 draft (0:30). Plus, more love for Nick Foles, the Titans-Colts play-in game, Houston giving New England the no. 2 seed, and Eli Manning’s late-season resurgence (25:30).
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
